entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: SSE 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain or freezing rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain this morning and ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:08 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 08:08 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
